zachvac

hmm, I notice that you are both new. We've had a couple (at least 2) problems with new people starting a formal debate, then leaving unexplainably. You both should probably look around at the informal debates, get the feeling of things, and then if you still want to participate in a formal debate you can do so. Obviously I have no authority, just that's my understanding of it.
